Can\'t find an app to select media. BChat requires the Storage permission in order to attach photos, videos, or audio, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\". BChat requires Contacts permission in order to attach contact information, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Contacts\". BChat requires the Camera permission in order to take photos, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to the app settings menu, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".

Continue Copy Invalid URL Copied to clipboard Next Share Invalid BChat ID Cancel Ok Your BChat ID
Your BChat begins here... Create Account Sign In
What\'s BChat? It\'s a decentralized, encrypted messaging app So it doesn\'t collect my personal information or my conversation metadata? How does it work? Using a combination of advanced anonymous routing and end-to-end encryption technologies. Friends don\'t let friends use compromised messengers. You\'re welcome.
Say hello to your BChat ID Your BChat ID is the unique address people can use to contact you on BChat. With no connection to your real identity, your BChat ID is totally anonymous and private by design.
Restore your account Enter the recovery phrase that was given to you when you signed up to restore your account. Enter your recovery phrase
Pick your display name This will be your name when you use BChat. It can be your real name, an alias, or anything else you like. Enter a display name Please pick a display name Please pick a shorter display name
Recommended Please Pick an Option
You don\'t have any contacts yet Start a BChat Are you sure you want to leave this group? "Couldn\'t leave group" Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? Conversation deleted
Your Recovery Phrase Meet your recovery phrase Your recovery phrase is the master key to your BChat ID — you can use it to restore your BChat ID if you lose access to your device. Store your recovery phrase in a safe place, and don\'t give it to anyone. Hold to reveal
You\'re almost finished! 80% Secure your account by saving your recovery phrase Tap and hold the redacted words to reveal your recovery phrase, then store it safely to secure your BChat ID. Make sure to store your recovery phrase in a safe place
Hops BChat masks your IP address by routing your messages through several masternodes in the Beldex decentralized network. Your connection is currently routed through the following masternodes You Entry Node Master Node Destination Learn More Resolving…
New Chat Enter BChat ID Scan QR Code Scan a user\'s QR code to start a BChat. QR codes can be found by tapping the QR code icon in account settings.
Enter BChat ID Users can share their BChat ID by going into their account settings and tapping "Share BChat ID", or by sharing their QR code. Please check the BChat ID or BNS name and try again.
BChat needs camera access to scan QR codes Grant Camera Access
New Secret Group Enter a group name No Contacts yet. Start a Chat Please enter a group name Please enter a shorter group name Please pick at least 1 group member A secret group cannot have more than 100 members

Clear All Data This will permanently delete your messages, BChats, and contacts. Would you like to clear only this device ? Delete Only Entire Account

Message Notifications There are two ways BChat can notify you of new messages. Fast Mode Slow Mode You’ll be notified of new messages reliably and immediately using Google’s notification servers. BChat will occasionally check for new messages in the background.

Enable Link Previews? Enabling link previews will show previews for URLs you send and receive. This can be useful, but BChat will need to contact linked websites to generate previews. You can always disable link previews in BChat\'s settings. Enable

Enter your old password and new password to update your password in app lock.
None 30 seconds 1 Minute 2 Minutes 5 Minutes 15 Minutes 30 Minutes
Yippie! Your BChat is being set up! Scan Beldex Address bx00f9b10ec366631ba25a9c6a0279e12d93c260134fce646d4c425356da5c9b480987654321a7b8c9e7a4d1b6f9e9e8 The private Web3 messaging app that protects your conversational freedom. Create an account instantly. Set your display name Your display name is not your username and you can change it anytime. Your BChat ID is like your username. You can share it with your friends to begin a conversation. Your Beldex address is connected to your BChat ID. You can use this address to receive BDX. Enter a four digit pin to add an additional layer of security to your BChat account. Your pin is required to unlock your account or view your recovery keys and recovery seed once you\'re logged in. Note: Save your recovery seed! Only your recovery seed can be used to recover your account on another device. Copy the recovery seed to continue. Share your BChat ID with your friends. You can find your BChat ID below. Never share your seed with anyone! Your seed can be used to restore your account. Never share it with anyone or store a digital copy of it. Never enter your seed in any other website or application other than BChat or the Beldex official wallet. Check your surroundings to ensure no one is overlooking. Do you want to proceed? Yes, I\'m Safe. Enter your recovery seed to restore your account. Never share your restore key with anyone! Your key can be used to restore your account. Never share it with anyone or store a digital copy of it. Never enter your restore key in any other website or application other than BChat or the Beldex official wallet. Check your surroundings and ensure no one is overlooking. Do you want to proceed? Enter your four digit pin to unlock your account Enter your password to view your seed. Write it down on paper. Enter your password to view your restore key. Write it down on paper. Uh oh, you don\'t have any contacts yet.\nAdd some contacts first to start a secret group. Social groups are similar to public groups, however, you need an invite link to join. Join a social group using the group\'s URL. If you don\'t know the restore blockheight, you can skip it. If you don\'t know the restore date, you can skip it. Changelog Enter your password Navigate to voice message · %1$s %1$d:%2$02d Pause voice message Play voice message Profile Name Your BChat ID is copied to clipboard Your Beldex Address is copied to clipboard Copy the recovery seed to continue You have a new message request Message Requests Sending a message to this user will automatically accept their message request and reveal your BChat ID. Accept Decline Clear All Are you sure you want to delete this message request? Message request deleted Are you sure you want to clear all message requests? Message requests deleted Your message request has been accepted. Your message request is currently pending. No pending message requests Accept All Clear Are you sure you want to accept this request? Declining this request will permanently block this user, are you sure? No blocked contacts yet Blocked Contacts
Call Missed You missed a call because you need to enable the \'Voice and video calls\' permission in the Privacy Settings. Connecting… Incoming call Deny call Answer call Establishing call Cancel call Call in progress End call Bchat Call Reconnecting… Call Call Permissions Required You missed a call because you need to enable the \'Voice and video calls\' permission in the privacy Settings. Voice / video calls The current implementation of voice / video calls will expose your IP address to the Beldex servers and the calling / called user Notifications Having notifications disabled will prevent you from receiving calls, go to Bchat notification settings? Dismiss Voice and video calls Allow access to accept voice and video calls from other users Incoming Call Outgoing Call End to End Encrypted 00:10:10 Hangup Back to call Call in progress Call Muted Video Paused Video paused and microphone off Call Declined If user decline the call show call declined status. Test Result: Please wait for scan to finish Touch to select or add nodes Add nodes manually or pull down to scan Scanning network… Automatically bookmarked best %1$d nodes Test Info about Wallet Password generation To access your wallet, you will first need to generate a wallet password. Your wallet password can be used to access your wallet within BChat and authenticate your transactions. You can generate a wallet password only by restoring your account. If you wish to continue, click “proceed.” Proceed
Note: Copy your Recovery Seed and save it. You will need the Recovery Seed to restore your account and generate a wallet password. \nIf you lose your seed, you will permanently lose access to your account. Do you wish to continue to sign-in and restore your account? This is the PIN you set to your BChat account. Enter your PIN to verify Please pick a restore height or restore from date Please pick a restore height Please pick a restore from date
